title: Champ select timer stuck at 0, I got the 5 minute penalty and lost 4-5 LP..?
body: But i go on internet and it was perfectly fine and i had no spikes in my connection...

replies.body: It sounds to me like you lost sync in champion select, and left you behind.  This can happen with a bad or lost connection, so it's important to get this fixed up to prevent a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging).  I recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve this!  Let me know if you have any questions.
